articles.title: Nerf’s new blasters curve their shots a la Angelina Jolie in Wanted - The Verge
articles.description: Nerf’s got a new trick up its sleeve: Hasbro’s latest foam-flinging sidearms can curve their shots, possibly letting you hit targets you can’t even see. They’re called the Rival Curve, and they use a twistable hop-up barrel to sling shots around corners.
